body:
I' ve tried to install a gcc 4.9.3 that depends on gmp.
On my system, mys system curl return error when
curl https://gmplib.org/download/gmp/gmp-6.1.0.tar.bz2
wget downloads and also spack installed curl does.

I modified gmp to dpend on curl and to use it in fetch.
I made that optional with a variant.
Is this stuff worth a PR? or better I put this on one private repo?
title: Problem downloading gmp ( needed when building gcc)
